DOC.brief_summary: Successfully develop and confirm with the Higher School of Electronics West Plethysmographic a multichannel recorder to perform measurements staggered volume of the lower limbs at rest, walking and recovery (6 storied measures on members lower).
DOC.detailed_description: Validate the measurement made by EAP (Electroactive polymer) during walking tests in venous insufficient subjects and healthy subjects by comparing the measurement made by the reference technique by mercury gauge.
DOC.criteria: present or not venous pathology amputation of a lower limb heart failure Severe respiratory disease Unstable angina or myocardial infarction Parkinson's disease, hemiplegia and paraplegia
